briefTitle: The Suitability of Sniff Dog as a Tool in Screening Tumors
officialTitle: The Suitability of Sniff Dog as a Tool in Screening Tumors-- a Prospective Observational Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Sensitivity and specificity in screening cancer patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* old than 20 years
* currently without cancer diagnosed with pathological examination
* allow the study team to examine his/her case history and incoming record

Exclusion Criteria:

* cancer patients with pathological diagnosis
* who does not allow the study team to examine his/her case history and incoming record
